H0.text: what kind of money do i need in costa rica. US Dollar

H1.text: what kind of money do i need in costa rica. Mexican Peso

H2.text: what kind of money do i need in costa rica. Euro

H3.text: what kind of money do i need in costa rica. Costa Rican colón

A4.text: The colón (plural: colones; sign: ₡; code: CRC) is the currency of Costa Rica.

A5.text: The colón is sometimes referred to as the peso, which was the name of the Costa Rican currency before the colón, until 1896.
